amendment.description: Amendment sought to require entities sponsoring political programming to disclose the identity of any donor that has contributed $10,000 or more to such entity in an election reporting cycle.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-422 to require entities sponsoring political programming to disclose the identity of any donor that has contributed $10,000 or more to such entity in an election reporting cycle.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Eshoo amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 238 (Roll no. 135).
